title: Teriyaki Chicken Don
description: A simple teriyaki chicken don dish with succulent chicken thighs in a homemade teriyaki sauce served over rice with tomato and salad.
overview: Flavorful teriyaki chicken don with marinated chicken, glossy teriyaki sauce, and fresh accompaniments.

stages.title: Step 1: Prep Chicken
content: Slice the chicken (try not to slice too thin).
Dust with 1 tsp cornflour and massage well to coat.

stages.title: Step 2: Make Teriyaki Sauce
content: In a bowl, combine 1 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp mirin, 2 tbsp sake, and 2 tsp sugar. Set aside.

stages.title: Step 3: Fry Chicken
content: Preheat medium-high oil in a pan. Fry the chicken for 2 minutes on one side.
Flip and fry for another 2 minutes.

stages.title: Step 4: Add Sauce
content: Pour the prepared teriyaki sauce over the chicken and cook for 2-3 minutes until the sauce thickens and evenly coats the chicken.

stages.title: Step 5: Assemble
content: Serve the chicken over rice and garnish with 1/2 tomato and a mixed salad.
